item.title: CARDINAL HEALTH INC 10-K
item.description: CARDINAL HEALTH INC, which is in the Wholesale-Drugs Proprietaries & Druggists' Sundries [5122] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 11, 2022 had 39065 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 545 instances fiscal - 480 instances tax - 400 instances health - 367 instances 10 - 362 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
